page.title: 14POPULATION-EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN OUR AREA, THERE LIVE FORTY SEVEN PEOPLE. IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE TWO NURSES, TWO CLEANERS, SIX MILL WORKERS, A BUILDER, ONE FORESTER, SEVEN RETIRED PEOPLE AND ONE DINNER LADY WHO WORKS IN THE SCHOOL. ALSO IN OUR AREA THERE IS ONE FARM WORKER. IN PART OF THE AREA WE HAVE A LANDOWNER WITH THREE PEOPLE WORKING FOR HIM WHO LIVE INSIDE THE BOUNDARY. WE HAVE A PART-TIME TEACHER. THERE ARE SIXTEEN CHILDREN TOO. ALSO THERE ARE TWO PART-TIME HOTEL WAITRESSES, TWO PEOPLE WHO ARE UNEMPLOYED AND ONE HOUSEWIFE. MOST OF THE PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL OUT OF THE AREA FOR THEIR JOBS.
